meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Denmark and Norway.
meanings.sent1: In Denmark, you can use copens to buy delicious pastries.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for copens at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The copens in my wallet felt like tiny treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of copens.
meanings.sent5: The shiny copens jingled in his pocket.

meanings.sent1: She copens a new book every month from the library.
meanings.sent2: I hope to copens a good grade on my test.
meanings.sent3: He tried to copens a nap during the noisy party.
meanings.sent4: The detective copens valuable information from the suspect.
meanings.sent5: The explorer copens a rare gem from the cave.

meanings.definition: To exchange goods or services for money.
meanings.sent1: They copens their handmade crafts at the local market.
meanings.sent2: I copens my old clothes for cash at the thrift store.
meanings.sent3: The magician copens a coin for a dazzling trick.
meanings.sent4: She copens her time for a fair wage at the bakery.
meanings.sent5: The farmer copens fresh produce for copens at the farmer's market.
